name: Cobra (perezgrin)
description:
The Cobra Empire rules with authority the lands of Kythya, Vendha and Hyrca. These worlds are fed up with the situation and each one has chosen its best warrior to visit the Oracle to prove his brave and be instructed to overthrow the infamous leader. You must choose one of them and be ready to make a great sacrifice, complete your missions and defeat the King Cobra.

This game is based on a famous Spanish board game.

For better entertainment, you have to gain the right to roll the dice whenever is your turn. You must complete a random mini-game; if you win, you can roll the dice and advance your warrior. Part of the fun is to find out what you have to do in each mini-game.

Thanks to Pepe Pineda and Isidre Mones for creating this board game from Cefa Toys, and to www.imprimiryjugar.com for its preservation.

  • Play from 1 to 3 players simultaneously (human or computer)
  • Go to the Oracle (between space nº 8 and 9) to get your missions. Pick up the weapons for each mission, they’ll be scattered across the three worlds. Once you’re equipped, go to the indicated location and complete both missions to confront the final challenge.
  • You have to complete one of the 9 challenges to move through the board. If you succeed, you can roll the dice (border will change to green). If you fail, your turn is over (red border); but don’t get down, after two consecutive falls, you’ll roll the dice automatically
  • As you advance in the game, the challenges become harder. Beat King Cobra before time runs out.
